Assets, libraries and services used in this application

  • AppCompat and Material Design components for most widgets(Apache 2.0)
  • Guava for various android utilities (Apache 2.0)
  • OkHttp for HTTP(s) requests, generally (Apache 2.0)
  • OSMDroid for the map taking centre stage i nthe scanner (Apache 2.0)
  • Sig4j to provide signals and slots for easy inter-class communication (MIT)
  • ACRA for crash reporting (Apache 2)
